item.title: Bash Cheatsheet on macOS
item.description: Overview Jure did a very impressive job on the Linux cheatsheet.1 It covered generic linux and some part of ubuntu and Debian distribution. Since I am a user of macOS, a lot of shortcuts and commands are not available on macOS’s platform, thus I am going to write my own cheatsheet. You can also see this one as a best practice of using terminal on macOS. Terminal shortcuts [macOS iTerm2] Package management Homebrew is a widely used package management tool on macOS platform.

item.title: Mount a filesystem
